name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Go Engineer with 13+ years of full stack development experience, specializing in building high-performance applications with robust infrastructures. Proficient in cloud services such as **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**, along with comprehensive expertise in **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and Infrastructure as Code principles. Skilled in CI/CD practices, implementing **GitOps**, and ensuring quality through unit and integration testing.
Strong background in developing distributed systems with a focus on security measures, IAM, and telemetry. Proven problem-solving capabilities complemented by effective collaboration and communication skills. Adept at integrating emerging technologies, including AI/ML, delivering solutions aligned with industry compliance standards. Proficient with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, while also leveraging frameworks like **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed scalable and secure **Go** applications leveraging **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud** to manage cloud infrastructure and services.
- Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines using tools such as **Terraform**, ensuring automated deployment and infrastructure as code practices to enhance operational efficiency.
- Architected distributed systems with microservices architecture, utilizing **Kubernetes** for orchestration and management of containerized applications, leading to improved scalability and resilience.
- Implemented robust security measures by integrating IAM protocols and telemetry, achieving compliance with organizational security standards and best practices.
- Created comprehensive unit testing and integration testing frameworks using **Linux/Unix** environments to guarantee code quality and reliability.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams, enhancing communication on project requirements and deliverables while supporting agile methodologies to speed up development cycles.
- Employed problem-solving techniques to troubleshoot complex technical issues within the codebase and infrastructure, contributing to smoother operational workflows and reduced downtime.
- Developed monitoring and logging solutions for applications, providing key performance metrics and insights to enhance system stability and performance.

Utilized **AWS** and **Azure** to enhance cloud infrastructure for financial applications, focusing on scalability and security across distributed systems.
Developed CI/CD pipelines with **Terraform** and GitOps strategies, ensuring efficient deployment and management of services in a Kubernetes environment.
Implemented unit testing and integration testing frameworks for **Go**, ensuring the reliability and performance of microservices within the application stack.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve **Infrastructure as Code** principles, enabling rapid provisioning and management of cloud resources across **Google Cloud**, **AWS**, and **Azure**.
Designed robust IAM strategies to strengthen security protocols, ensuring compliance and protecting sensitive financial data.
Leveraged telemetry tools for enhanced monitoring and logging, providing real-time insights into application performance and system operations.
Demonstrated exceptional problem-solving skills by identifying bottlenecks in the architecture and enhancing system responsiveness by **30%**.
Engaged in regular communication with stakeholders to align engineering goals with business objectives, fostering a collaborative work environment.
Contributed to the optimization of deployment processes, achieving a **50%** reduction in deployment time through efficient CI/CD practices.

Designed and optimized distributed systems leveraging **Go** and **AWS**, ensuring high availability and scalability across microservices for a global e-commerce platform.
Implemented Infrastructure as Code using **Terraform** to manage and provision cloud infrastructure across **AWS**, enhancing deployment efficiency and reliability.
Developed CI/CD pipelines with **Kubernetes** and GitOps principles, enabling streamlined code integration, automated testing, and deployment workflows that reduced lead time by **30%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement role-based access control (RBAC) and security measures, ensuring compliance with IAM standards and enhancing application security.
Engineered telemetry solutions for performance monitoring and log management, improving system observability and problem-solving capabilities.
Conducted unit testing and integration testing to deliver high-quality code, achieving a test coverage rate of **85%** and ensuring seamless functionality across services.
Honed problem-solving and communication skills by participating in agile ceremonies and brainstorming sessions, enhancing team collaboration and reducing feature delivery time by **20%**.
Participated in code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and collaboration within the engineering team.
Utilized **Linux/Unix** environments for application deployment and management, ensuring optimal performance and reliability across production systems.
